quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
quotes.text: Our life is what our thoughts make it.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.text: Whatever can happen at any time can happen today.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.text: Leisure without book is death, and burial of a man alive.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.text: Don't explain your philosophy. Embody it.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.text: Beyond all things is the sea.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.text: Fire tests gold, suffering tests brave men.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.text: It doesn't matter how many books you have, but how good the books you have are.

quotes.author: Epictetus
quotes.text: First say to yourself what you would be, and then do what you have to do.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.text: We learn not in school, but in life.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.text: If a man knows not to which port he sails, no sail is favorable.
